name: Tower of Boom (cocochili, April, Remezoker, Duckistopheles, Hexagoos, Angenakoi)
name_original: Tower of Boom (cocochili, April, Remezoker, Duckistopheles, Hexagoos, Angenakoi)
description:
"Tower of Boom" is a 2D-Platformer, where you climb up a tower while dragon blast fire at you to protect the treasure.  (Warning: Dragons not included.)

This project was created in a 48-hour Game Jam organized by "alpha". The mascot "Alphons" can be found in the game. Additional sounds are taken from the website "Zapsplat.com".

This game can be played with controller or Keyboard.  

Controls ControllsKeyboardControllerMove (Left and Right)A, D; Arrow Left, Arrow RightLeft StickJumpSpace, W, Arrow UpA Button
